TopicTitle: May I submit KSP to alternative to?

Articles.Content:
Can I submit the app?

I want to make sure I have Harvs permission.

When you have to pay for it I will update the license.

Can I submit the app?

I want to make sure I have Harvs permission.

When you have to pay for it I will update the license.

What is this site and what are your intentions?

[mod]Furthermore, as far as I have been made aware, only the demo may be submitted in any form and without attempted infringement. I would therefore suggest you contact HarvesteR for further permissions and information. Topic Locked. If you wish to respond to my question you may do so through private message.[/mod]
